message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product and allows me to make a reasonable profit.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
